hero.title: Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: 1st year – ENSA Tangier
hero.tagline: Passionate about development, AI, and building smart digital solutions.

about.title: About Me
text: I'm currently a student at ENSA Tangier — not because I dreamed of becoming an engineer, but because I knew I needed an environment that matched my mindset. After the cybersecurity & networks program I was in got canceled, and a disappointing year at FP Larache, I decided to shift toward something I could truly enjoy and grow in.

My passion lies in cybersecurity and AI. I love building digital tools — websites, apps, scripts — and automating tasks using AI tools like ChatGPT and Cursor. I don't just use them to build — I use them to learn. They've helped me realize that with a basic understanding and a hands-on mindset, you can build almost anything.

My goal is to become one of the best at using AI to build things, solve problems, automate work, and earn a living efficiently. I work fast, think sharp, and sometimes act recklessly — but I learn from every step, and I'm always moving forward toward what's next.

technical.title: Technical Skills
items: Proficient in building web & mobile interfaces using AI-assisted tools (Cursor AI, ChatGPT)
Confident understanding of web fundamentals: HTML, CSS, JS, React Native, Tailwind
Able to ship functional apps (e.g. to-do list, filters, swipe actions) using Expo and Supabase
Strong grasp of Git, version control, and deploying with Vercel
Excel at learning new tools through AI-powered "learn by doing"
Approach problem-solving by combining logic with AI-enhanced iteration

soft.title: Soft Skills
items: Self-driven and proactive: turn ideas into working solutions
Curious and fast learner, thrives with hands-on practice
Time-conscious and able to organize solo or team work
Communicate clearly and confidently (verbal and written)
Resilient: learns from mistakes, adapts fast
Obsessed with doing more with less using automation and AI

items.title: 1st year Computer Development & DevOps Methods License
